title: Add Enter key navigation between form fields

requirements.summary: Enable Enter key navigation from farmer ID field to quantity field in milk collection form
acceptanceCriteria: Pressing Enter in the farmer ID input moves focus to the quantity input
The Enter key behavior does not interfere with existing farmer lookup functionality

file_operations.description: Add onKeyDown handler to farmer ID input field that detects Enter key press and programmatically focuses the weight/quantity input field using a ref. Ensure the handler does not prevent the existing farmer lookup functionality from working.

requirements.summary: Enable Enter key navigation from quantity field to fat field in milk collection form
acceptanceCriteria: Pressing Enter in the quantity input moves focus to the fat input

file_operations.description: Add onKeyDown handler to weight/quantity input field that detects Enter key press and programmatically focuses the fat input field using a ref.

requirements.summary: Enable Enter key to trigger save action from fat field in milk collection form
acceptanceCriteria: Pressing Enter in the fat input submits the form
Success/error feedback is displayed after submission attempt

file_operations.description: Add onKeyDown handler to fat input field that detects Enter key press and triggers the existing form submission logic (handleSubmit). Ensure all existing validation and error handling flows are preserved.
